stimulusHtml:
Listen to the excerpt.


Which of the following statements most accurately describes the function of the chords in the progression that is heard?
choicesHtml: A dominant seventh chord in second inversion prolongs the tonic between a ⅰ and a ⅰ6 chord.
A leading tone triad in first inversion prolongs the tonic between a ⅰ and a ⅰ6 chord.
A dominant triad in root position is heard between two root position tonic triads.
A leading tone seventh chord functions as a substitute for the dominant between two root position tonic triads.
